chunk: PSM Health Plan: 7,350 Plan Option
What is the overall deductible? $7,350/individual or $14,700/family
Are there services covered before you meet your deductible? Yes. Preventive care services are covered before you meet your deductible.
Are there other deductibles for specific services? No.
What is the out-of-pocket limit for this plan? $7,350/individual or $14,700/family
What is not included in the out-of-pocket limit? Premiums, balanced-billing charges, and health care this plan doesn’t cover.
Will you pay less if you use a network provider? No network restrictions.
Do you need a referral to see a specialist? No. You don’t need a referral to see a specialist.
Primary care visit to treat an injury or illness $25 copay/visit
Specialist visit $45 copay/visit
Preventive care/screening/ immunization 0% coinsurance
Diagnostic test (blood work) Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Diagnostic test (blood work) Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Imaging (X-Ray, CT/PET scans, MRIs) Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Imaging (X-Ray, CT/PET scans, MRIs) Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Generic drugs America’s Pharmacy Source
Preferred brand drugs America’s Pharmacy Source
Non-preferred brand drugs Not covered
Specialty drugs Not covered
Facility fee (e.g., ambulatory surgery center) Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Facility fee (e.g., ambulatory surgery center) Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Physician/surgeon fees Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Emergency room care Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Emergency room care Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Emergency medical transportation 0% after deductible
Urgent care $60 copay/visit
Facility fee (e.g., hospital room) Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Facility fee (e.g., hospital room) Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Physician/surgeon fees Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Outpatient services $25 copay/visit
Inpatient services Deductible/Coinsurance
Inpatient services Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Childbirth/delivery professional services Professional Fees: 0% after deductible
Childbirth/delivery facility services Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Home health care 0% after deductible
Home health care Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Rehabilitation services 0% after copayment, per visit
Rehabilitation services Limited to 20 visits per Calendar Year for physical, and occupational therapies each, 20 visits for Speech, 15 visits for Chiropractic.
Habilitation services 0% after copayment, per visit
Habilitation services Limited to 20 visits per Calendar Year, combined with the above therapies.
Skilled nursing care Facility: 0% of plan allowable, deductible does not apply
Skilled nursing care Limited to 60 days per Calendar Year. Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Durable medical equipment 0% after deductible
Durable medical equipment Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Hospice services 0% after deductible
Hospice services Failure to obtain precertification will result in a 50% benefit reduction ($2,500 maximum).
Children’s eye exam Not covered
Children’s glasses Not covered
Children’s dental check-up Not covered

Services Your Plan Generally Does NOT Cover:
• Acupuncture
• Infertility treatments
• Bariatric surgery • Private-duty nursing
• Long-term care
• Cosmetic surgery • Routine foot care
• Non-emergency care when traveling outside the
• Dental care (Adult) • Weight loss programs
U.S.

Other Covered Services:
• Chiropractic Care • Durable medical equipment
Does this plan provide Minimum Essential Coverage? Yes
Does this plan meet the Minimum Value Standards? Yes
